column1: #text=I looked up a cake that I thought my wife might like .
#text=I thought a devil 's food cake would be perfect .
#text=I started by preheating the oven to 350 degrees .
#text=I got down the dry ingredients - flour , sugar , baking powder , cocoa powder - measured out the quantities the recipe said and put them in a bowl .
#text=Then I got the wet ingredients - eggs , oil , milk - and mixed those up in a separate bowl .
#text=Then I combined the two bowls together and mixed them thoroughly .
#text=I poured the contents into two pans and then put them in the oven .
#text=About a half hour later I took the two pans out of the oven and let them cool .
#text=When they were cool enough , I took a can on frosting out of the cupboard and iced the two layers , stacking on on the other .
